hero.subtitle: EXPERT SUPPORT FOR YOUR HEAVY EQUIPMENT
hero.title: Service With Hundreds of the Most Complete Services Only at THEI!
hero.description: Maintain your heavy equipment's peak performance with our expert technician support and comprehensive 24/7 service solutions.

service_packages.title: Our Premium Service Packages
service_packages.description: Choose the package that best suits your operational needs. All our packages are designed to deliver maximum performance and peace of mind.

services.title: Hundreds-Point Inspection
services.description: Detailed inspection service to ensure new units are ready for work or old units remain in prime condition.

services.title: Fuel Efficiency
services.description: Audit and training programs to help you achieve maximum fuel efficiency.

services.title: Hydraulic Service
services.description: Complete service for hydraulic systems, ensuring the precision and power of your heavy equipment.

services.title: Electrical & ECM
services.description: Advanced diagnostics and repair for all electronic components and engine control modules.

services.title: AC Maintenance
services.description: Ensure operator comfort and safety with our comprehensive AC maintenance service.

services.title: Preventive Maintenance
services.description: Planned preventive maintenance program to maintain reliability and minimize operational costs.

services.title: Rebuild & Overhaul
services.description: Restore your heavy equipment's main components to like-new condition with manufacturer quality standards.

services.title: Field Service 24/7
services.description: Our field service team is ready to come to your location anytime for emergency repairs.

services.title: Undercarriage & Track
services.description: Special maintenance and repair for undercarriages to ensure optimal mobility and stability.

services.title: Fabrication & Welding
services.description: Precision fabrication and welding solutions to repair structural damage and modifications.

services.title: Service Agreement
services.description: Customized service contracts to guarantee uptime and efficiency according to your KPI targets.

quality_gallery.title: Service Gallery
quality_gallery.description: See tangible proof of our service quality through this gallery.

before_after.title: See the Real Transformation of Our Work

field_service_highlight.title: Ready to Serve Anytime, Anywhere.
field_service_highlight.description: Our fully-equipped Field Service fleet is ready to reach your location 24/7 to ensure minimal downtime and maximum productivity.
